name: Portuguese
description: Traditional Portuguese cuisine with a focus on fresh seafood, hearty stews, and flavorful desserts.

name: Italian
description: Authentic Italian dishes including pizza, pasta, and gelato, prepared with fresh ingredients and traditional recipes.

name: Japanese
description: Exquisite Japanese cuisine featuring sushi, sashimi, ramen, and other delicacies, crafted with precision and artistry.

name: Mexican
description: Vibrant Mexican flavors with dishes like tacos, enchiladas, and guacamole, accompanied by refreshing margaritas.

name: Indian
description: Spicy and aromatic Indian cuisine with a variety of curries, biryanis, and tandoori specialties, bursting with flavors.

name: Mediterranean
description: Fresh and healthy Mediterranean dishes showcasing ingredients like olive oil, vegetables, seafood, and herbs.

name: Brazilian
description: Authentic Brazilian cuisine with a mix of African, Portuguese, and indigenous influences, featuring dishes like feijoada and brigadeiros.
